docs.title: Welcome
docs.text:
This blog is intended to facilitate understand and discussion of how to evaluate and improving the rigor in vocational training. The target audience is curriculum developers and organizational leaders new to academic study of rigor and how it can be used to improve learning outcomes.

Please feel free to leave feedback including topics you feel would be interesting and appropriate for a public discussion.
